Sunday, October 5th, 2014

by Peter, October 05, 2014

New Node Request

We’ll be meeting at a member’s home in an effort to get the nodes in the East Village connected. Anyone who is interested in the actual setup of a node, feel free to stop by.

If you’re unable to locate the place, send an email to peter@nycmesh.net and we’ll find you.

91 E 3rd St. #35
New York, NY 10003
Location on Google Maps
Sunday, October 5th, 2014 at 3pm
